Literature.Title: Optimization of globomycin analogs as novel gram-negative antibiotics.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli CFT073(MIC=5.4µM),Escherichia coli CFT073imp4213(MIC=0.016µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=25µM)
